name: Plato
quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.

name: Confucius
quote: The man who asks question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.

name: Lao Tzu
quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in future.If you are at peace, you are living in present.

name: Jesus Christ
quote: A new command I give you: love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.

name: Gautam Buddha
quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only be love; this is the eternal rule.

name: Osho Rajneesh
quote: Respect yourself, love yourself, because there has never been a person like you and there never will be again.

name: Saint Kabir
quote: The lord is in me, the lord is in every seed, put false pride away and seek the lord within.

name: Guru Nanak
quote: He who has no faith in himself can never have faith in god.

name: Echkart Tolle
quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the Now primary focus of your life.

name: Sri Sri Ravishankar
quote: Today is a gift from God-that is why it is called the present.

name: Jaggi Vasudev
quote: If you think you are big, you become small. If you know you are nothing, you become unlimited.
